# add(_:withObserver:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a new analysis request to the audio file analyzer.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ request: any SNRequest, withObserver observer: any SNResultsObserving) throws
```

## Parameters

- **request**: A sound analysis request.
- **observer**: An [doc://com.apple.soundanalysis/documentation/SoundAnalysis/SNResultsObserving] instance that receives the analyzerâ€™s results. The analyzer maintains a weak reference to the observer.

## Discussion

The method throws an error (Swift) or returns an error (Objective-C) if the analyzer is actively processing the file.

## Managing Requests

- **SNRequest**: A protocol that represents sound analysis requests.
- **SNResultsObserving**: The interface your app implements to receive the results of an analysis request.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes an existing request from the audio file analyzer.
- **removeAllRequests()**: Removes all the sound analysis requests from the audio file analyzer.
